items.name: Apple
items.description: Apples are one of the most popular fruits in the world, known for their crisp texture, sweet-tart flavor, and versatility. They are rich in fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants, and are often eaten fresh, baked in pies, or made into juice or sauce.

items.name: Banana
items.description: Bananas are a staple fruit globally due to their soft texture and naturally sweet taste. They're a rich source of potassium and provide quick energy, making them perfect for breakfast or snacks.

items.name: Mango
items.description: Mangoes are tropical fruits loved for their juicy, sweet flavor and vibrant orange-yellow flesh. They're high in vitamin C and beta-carotene, perfect for juices, smoothies, or desserts.

items.name: Orange
items.description: Oranges are well-known citrus fruits packed with vitamin C and a refreshing tangy flavor. They are commonly used in fresh juices, salads, and desserts.

items.name: Avocado
items.description: Avocado come in green, red, and purple varieties and are naturally sweet and juicy. They're perfect for snacking, juicing, or making wines.

items.name: Pineapple
items.description: Pineapples are tropical fruits with a distinctive flavor—sweet and slightly acidic. Their juicy texture and high vitamin C content make them excellent in drinks, fruit salads, or grilled.

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: Strawberry are filled with juicy, ruby-red seeds called arils. They're rich in antioxidants, vitamins, and known for their immunity-boosting properties.

items.name: Qiwi
items.description: Qiwi are tropical fruits with a fragrant aroma and sweet flavor. They are rich in fiber and vitamin C and often used in juices, candies, and smoothies.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Classic Caesar salad made with fresh romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, parmesan cheese, and creamy Caesar dressing. Perfect as a side or light meal.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: A refreshing Mediterranean salad featuring cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, olives, feta cheese, and a tangy oregano vinaigrette.

items.name: Garden Salad
items.description: A healthy mix of fresh greens, cherry tomatoes, carrots, cucumbers, and red onions tossed with your choice of dressing.

items.name: Quinoa Salad
items.description: Nutritious quinoa mixed with fresh veggies like bell peppers, cucumbers, and herbs, dressed with lemon and olive oil.

items.name: Carrot
items.description: Crunchy and sweet carrots rich in beta-carotene and fiber. Ideal for snacking, salads, or cooking.

items.name: Broccoli
items.description: Fresh broccoli florets loaded with vitamins and antioxidants. Great steamed, roasted, or in stir-fries.

items.name: Veggies
items.description: Tender spinach leaves packed with iron, vitamins, and minerals. Perfect for salads, smoothies, or sautéing.

items.name: Tomato
items.description: Juicy and ripe tomatoes with a balance of sweetness and acidity. Essential for salads, sauces, and cooking.

items.name: Red Bell Pepper
items.description: Cool and crisp cucumbers that add freshness to salads and sandwiches. Low in calories and hydrating.

items.name: Orange Juice
items.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice packed with vitamin C and natural sweetness. A perfect refreshing drink for any time of day.

items.name: Green Tea
items.description: Light and aromatic green tea rich in antioxidants. Known for its calming and health-boosting properties.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: Strong and flavorful coffee made from freshly ground beans. Ideal for a morning boost or afternoon pick-me-up.

items.name: Mango Smoothie
items.description: Creamy and sweet mango smoothie made with fresh mangoes and yogurt. A delicious and nutritious treat.

items.name: Lemonade
items.description: Refreshing homemade lemonade with a perfect balance of tartness and sweetness. Great for cooling down on hot days.
